description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
species of individuals participating in the study -bonobo/chimpanzee/orangutan
set of trials -  combination of condition/ sequence/and retrieval_session
whether the participants witnessed a hiding event of the food before the retrieval session -  experimental (witnessed) / control (did not witness)
first condition presented to each participant -  experimental / control
two session in which the participant could retrieve the food with the presence of the experimenter, who either hid the food or did not hide it – 1= did not hide / 2 = hid
delay period in weeks between hiding event and retrieval sessions – 2 / 10 / 50
type of food that was hidden during the hiding event– pellet (cardamom) / bread
whether the participant searched for the food or not - yes / no
whether the participant searched for the food in binary – 1 = yes / 0 = no
the time in seconds it took the participant from picking up the food from the ground to reaching the hiding location
